resources.string: I\'d like to call you securely using RedPhone. You can install RedPhone from the Play Store: %s

The number you dialed is not registered with RedPhone. Both parties of a call need to have RedPhone installed in order to have a secure conversation. Would you like to send a RedPhone install link to the contact you were trying to dial?
You must specify your phone number!
You must specify your country code
The number you specified (%s) is invalid.

We will now verify that the following number is associated with this device:

%s

Is this number correct, or would you like to edit it before continuing?
You must enter the code you received first...
Unable to connect. Please check your network connection and try again.
The verification code you submitted is incorrect. Please try again.
You\'ve submitted an incorrect verification code too many times. Please wait a minute before trying again.
The server encountered an error. Please try again.
You\'ve already recently requested a voice call. You can request another in 20 minutes.
RedPhone registration has encountered a problem.
Please see whispersystems.org for additional information, or contact support@whispersystems.org with problems, questions, or comments.

RedPhone links to the SpanDSP library, which is licensed under the LGPL.

RedPhone uses the SPEEX Codec, which is used under the Xiph.Org variant of the BSD license: © 2002-2003, Jean-Marc Valin/Xiph.Org Foundation

By acclivity (http://www.freesound.org/usersViewSingle.php?id=37876):
ShipsBell.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=32304)

By Splashdust (http://www.freesound.org/usersViewSingle.php?id=754949):
negativebeep.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=67454)

By Peter_Gross (http://www.freesound.org/usersViewSingle.php?id=33429):
Sonar_pings.ogg (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=12677

By suonho: http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=58348: ambienta_soundtrack_moog_sweep

By Mike Koenig: Busy Signal
In order to make and receive secure calls, RedPhone needs to verify your phone number and register it with the system.\n\nPlease confirm your country code and phone number for this device.
YOUR COUNTRY CODE AND PHONE NUMBER
When making insecure calls, prompt for upgrade to RedPhone if contact is RedPhone-enabled.
Disabling Bluetooth may resolve audio issues on some devices
RedPhone timed out while waiting for an SMS message to verify your phone number.

Some third party text messaging clients, such as Handcent or GoSMS, behave poorly and intercept all incoming SMS messages. Check to see if you received a text message that starts with \'A RedPhone is trying to verify you\' in which case you\'ll need to configure your third party text messaging app to let text messages through.
Please check to make sure you entered your number correctly, and that it is formatted for correctly your region.
If you\'re attempting to register a Google Voice number, ensure that you are running the most recent version of the Google Voice app.
RedPhone was unable to connect to the switch.
Your device needs network connectivity in order to use RedPhone. Check to ensure that it is connected to the internet.
If you are connected via wifi, it\'s possible that there is a firewall blocking access to the RedPhone signaling ports. Try another network or mobile data.
RedPhone will now automatically verify your number with a confirmation SMS message.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when verification is complete.
RedPhone can also call you to verify your number. Tap \'Call Me\' and enter the six digit code that you hear below.
Sorry, there was a problem initializing the audio on your device.
You must dial a number first
